project.description:
Triggers longevity test with sct-agent enabled, every Saturday at 10:00 UTC.
Validates sct-agent readiness by running a standard longevity workload with agent-based command execution instead of SSH.

hudson.plugins.parameterizedtrigger.Pred.properties: scylla_version=master:latest provision_type=on_demand stress_duration=720 post_behavior_db_nodes=destroy post_behavior_loader_nodes=destroy post_behavior_monitor_nodes=destroy email_recipients=qa@scylladb.com requested_by_user=dimakr
